text: Resident Evil 3 is a 2020 survival horror video game that is a remake of Resident Evil 3: Nemesis. It is set before and after the events of Resident Evil 2. ==Gameplay== The player can play as Jill Valentine and defeat zombies including the titular Nemesis. ==Reception== People loved the game and improved graphics and controls but felt it was too short for a sequel. Nemesis is known for being a challenging boss. title: Resident Evil 3 (2020 video game)
